casebody.data:
LIPE
v.
STARR DAVIS COMPANY, INC., et al. No. 445P14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 24, 2015. M. Duane Jones, Charlotte, for Travelers Casualty & Surety. Hatcher B. Kincheloe, Charlotte. Michael B. Pross, Cathy A. Williams, Salisbury, for Lipe, Shirley, et al. Jeri L. Whitfield, Greensboro, Elizabeth Brooks Scherer, Raleigh, for N.C. Chamber and N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of December 2014 by Defendant (Travelers Casualty & Surety) for Temporary Stay:
